version_description:
1. App initial processing optimized.
2. New app icon.
3. Bugs fixed.

1. App initial processing optimized.
2. New app icon.
3. Bugs fixed.

1. Fix the crash problem of saving wallpaper.
2. Remove the slide menu backgrounds for performance issue.
3. Adjust font of the title on navigation bar.

1. Fix the crash problem of saving wallpaper.
2. Remove the slide menu backgrounds for performance issue.
3. Adjust font of the title on navigation bar.

1. New design of user interaction and user interface.
2. Wallpaper server moved to Amazon.
3. Game center supported.
4. Bug fix.

1. New design of user interaction and user interface.
2. Wallpaper server moved to Amazon.
3. Game center supported.
4. Bug fix.

1. New Feature: Top 100 hits wallpapers.
2. New Feature: Support to sort wallpapers by upload-time or hits.
3. New Feature: Support to change display language of albums.
4. Better user interface and experience.
5. Bug fix on iOS 9.

1. New Feature: Top 100 hits wallpapers.
2. New Feature: Support to sort wallpapers by upload-time or hits.
3. New Feature: Support to change display language of albums.
4. Better user interface and experience.
5. Bug fix on iOS 9.

If the wallpapers can not ne loaded, please have a try to switch the image server to Amazon or Qiniu in settings page.

1. Fixed the issue of network request failed.
2. Fixed the issues of ACG Quiz.
3. Fixed other bugs.
